comments:
1.5.1 code: Seeing this sporadically in some unit tests I'm creating when the test programmatically deletes an EAR project; when the error occurs the attempt to delete the EAR project fails.

...
 !ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 2006-07-14 16:22:01.734
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.resources".
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.common.classpath.J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.resourceChanged(J2EEComponentClasspathUpdater.java:464)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run(NotificationManager.java:280)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify(NotificationManager.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.broadcastChanges(NotificationManager.java:148)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.broadcastPostChange(Workspace.java:256)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.endOperation(Workspace.java:958)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Resource.delete(Resource.java:720)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.delete(Project.java:345)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.dependency.tests.AbstractTests.tearDown(AbstractTests.java:34)
	at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:130)
...

you then see this error in the log:

...
!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 2 2 2006-07-14 16:22:02.468
!MESSAGE Save operation warnings.
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 2 234 2006-07-14 16:22:02.468
!MESSAGE The project description file (.project) for TestEAR was missing.  This file contains important information about the project.  A new project description file has been created, but some information about the project may have been lost.
...
This has probably been fixed with bug 151448
